trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderImageMargin(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs)" />, <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderToolStripBorder(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs)" />, and <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderToolStripBackground(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs)" /> methods.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs> class also provides data for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawImageMargin%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawToolStripBorder%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawToolStripBackground%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs> classe também fornece dados para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawImageMargin%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawToolStripBorder%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawToolStripBackground%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderToolStripBorder%2A> method to draw a custom border around a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderToolStripBorder%2A> método para desenhar uma borda personalizada em torno de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controle.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs" /> class.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to use for painting.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> to paint.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs" /> class for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> and using the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to use for painting.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> to paint.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> representing the bounds of the area to be painted.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that the background of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> is painted with.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs" /> class for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />, using the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to paint the specified bounds with the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> representing the bounds of the area to be painted.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> representing the bounds of the area to be painted.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa os limites da área a ser pintada.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderToolStripBorder%2A> method to draw a custom border around a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderToolStripBorder%2A> método para desenhar uma borda personalizada em torno de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controle.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that the background of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> is painted with.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that the background of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> is painted with.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> com o qual a tela de fundo do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> é pintado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderToolStripBackground?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderToolStripBackground?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este relatório ajuda você a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância de um tipo que herda de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>, como um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>.

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `ToolStripRenderer1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderToolStripBackground?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, nomear a instância `ToolStripRenderer1` e certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderToolStripBackground?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> representing the overlap area between a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> and its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.OwnerItem" />.

The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> representing the overlap area between a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> and its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.OwnerItem" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa a área de sobreposição entre uma <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> e sua <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.OwnerItem" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> is not a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.OwnerItem%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is `null`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs.ConnectedArea%2A> property returns an empty <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> não é um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.OwnerItem%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> é `null`, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs.ConnectedArea%2A> propriedade retorna vazio <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderToolStripBackground?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderToolStripBackground?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este relatório ajuda você a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância de um tipo que herda de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>, como um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>.

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `ToolStripRenderer1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderToolStripBackground?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, nomear a instância `ToolStripRenderer1` e certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderToolStripBackground?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to paint.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to paint.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> usado para pintar.
